author: adrianc
msg: Added the ability for services to invoke Groovy script methods. Groovy service methods do not have parameters; parameters are passed in the context - just like simple method services.
Removed long comment (unused cache testing code) in GroovyUtil.java.

author: scottbw
msg: Applied the Notifications patch as described in WOOKIE-65. This filters notifications sent to widgets using Comet to ensure that only sibling instances (different user, same context, same widget URI) are notified of each other's changes to shared data/state. A hook is provided for other kinds of notifications (e.g. same user/context but different widget URI) to be implemented.

author: jbohn
msg: ARIES-264 - Blog - update the package names for api and biz - feel free to revert this change if necessary but it seems that a working sample is better than a broken one at this point
